```{r}
CCdata2020=read.csv("2020CovidData.csv")
CCdata2021=read.csv("2021CovidData.csv")
CCdata2022=read.csv("2022CovidData.csv")
CCdata2023=read.csv("2023CovidData.csv")
```


```{r}
names(CCdata2020)
names(CCdata2021)
names(CCdata2022)
names(CCdata2023)
```


```{r}
str(CCdata2020, width = 70, strict.width='cut')
str(CCdata2021, width = 70, strict.width='cut')
str(CCdata2022, width = 70, strict.width='cut')
str(CCdata2023, width = 70, strict.width='cut')
```


```{r}
CCdata2021=as.data.frame(table(CCdata2020$cases))
names(CCdata2020)=c("cases","state")

library(ggplot2)
base1=ggplot(data=CCdata2020, aes(x=state,cases))
bar1=base1+geom_bar(stat = "identity")
bar1
```

```{r}
summary(CCdata2020$cases)
```


```{r}
(statVals=summary(CCdata2020$cases,digits = 6)[1:6])
```


```{r}
library(magrittr)
statVals=statVals%>%as.vector()

base= ggplot(CCdata2020,aes(y = cases))  
b1= base + geom_boxplot() 
b1=b1 +coord_flip()
b1=b1+ scale_y_continuous(breaks = statVals)
b1
```
